title: Nasdaq and AWS Partner to Transform Markets
itunes:title: Nasdaq and AWS Partner to Transform Markets
description:
Ruba Borno, Global Channel Chief at Amazon Web Services, and Lauren Dillard, Executive VP of Investment Intelligence at Nasdaq, discuss their partnership to build cloud-enabled infrastructure for the world’s capital markets.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
